description: Support to Engendered Conflict Sensitive Development Programming in Yemen - BCPR Preparatory Assistance

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: The aim of this project is to strengthen CO and national capacity in promoting social cohesion and reducing tension through equitable, gender sensitive and conflict sensitive recovery programming
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Engendered Conflict Sensitive
